text: 13.15: Dan 3.4-6; VB 16.2; 19.20; 20.4Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra fhura ana garim, ana bɨɨŋbɨɨn mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga tuma kargi bigɨna nɨɨŋgim, ana buni nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga tuma kargi bigɨna rotur muuŋ thagi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mba kargi bigɨna tum ana suaŋrim, mbe mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzɨrga ŋkasŋka ki.
